at.rags.morpheus

Class Deserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.rags.morpheus.Deserializer

  • public class Deserializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Deserializer uses reflection to create objects and set fields.

    • Method Detail

      • registerResourceClass

        public static void registerResourceClass(java.lang.String typeName,
                                         java.lang.Class resourceClass)
        Register your class for a JSON type. Example: registerResourceClass("articles", Article.class);
        Parameters:
        typeName - Name of the JSONAPI type.
        resourceClass - Class for mapping.
        See Also:
        Resource

      • createObjectFromString

        public Resource createObjectFromString(java.lang.String resourceName)
                                throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                       NotExtendingResourceException
        Creates an instance of an object via its name.
        Parameters:
        resourceName - Name of the resource.
        Returns:
        Instance of the resourceName class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException - Throws exception when not able to create instance of class.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Throws exception when not able to create instance of class.
        NotExtendingResourceException - Throws exception when not able to create instance of class.

      • setField

        public Resource setField(Resource resourceObject,
                         java.lang.String fieldName,
                         java.lang.Object data)
        Sets the field of the resourceObject with the data.
        Parameters:
        resourceObject - Object with field to be set.
        fieldName - Name of the field.
        data - Data to set.
        Returns:
        Resource with or without field set

      • setIdField

        public Resource setIdField(Resource resourceObject,
                           java.lang.Object data)
                    throws NotExtendingResourceException
        Sets the Id field of the resourceObject extending Resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceObject - Object extending Resource.
        data - Data with Id (as String or Int)
        Returns:
        ResourceObject with set Id as String.
        Throws:
        NotExtendingResourceException - when none of the superclasses are Resource.

      • getRegisteredClasses

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class> getRegisteredClasses()

      • setRegisteredClasses

        public static void setRegisteredClasses(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class> registeredClasses)
